benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: PUT /1.0/kb/admin/healthcheck - Put the host back into rotation

covered: Successful PUT to put host back into rotation (TC01)
PUT request when host is already in rotation (TC02)
Forbidden access due to insufficient permissions (TC04)
PUT request with invalid HTTP method (TC06)
PUT request with additional unexpected headers (TC08)
PUT request with missing required headers (TC09)
PUT request during degraded system performance (TC10)
Regression - Previously fixed issue for host rotation (TC11)
PUT request with network interruption (transient failure) (TC13)
PUT request with large number of concurrent requests (TC14)
gaps: No explicit tests for system response to malformed or invalid request bodies beyond payload presence.
No tests explicitly cover race conditions or concurrency issues beyond TC14.
No tests for rate limiting or throttling behavior.
No scenarios testing caching headers or cache behavior.
No tests for non-HTTP methods other than GET and PUT, e.g., POST, DELETE, PATCH, which are outside scope but could be considered for completeness.
recommendations: Add tests for handling malformed or invalid request bodies beyond simple presence.
Include concurrency and race condition tests with more detailed scenarios.
Implement rate limiting and throttling tests to verify system robustness under load.
Add scenarios to verify caching headers and cache invalidation behavior.
Consider testing other HTTP methods if applicable for comprehensive coverage.
